content.prompt:
Listen to the excerpt.


Which of the following best describes the harmonic progression of this excerpt?

choices.label: Tonic, dominant, secondary leading tone chord that tonicizes the supertonic
Tonic, dominant, secondary leading tone chord that tonicizes the subdominant
Tonic, dominant, secondary leading tone chord that tonicizes the dominant
Tonic, dominant, secondary leading tone chord that tonicizes the subtonic

unit.text: 7: Harmony and Voice Leading IV - Secondary Function

topic.text: 7.3: Tonicization through Secondary Leading Tone Chords

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
